title: Finding The Characteristics
text: We must first put this parabola into standard form by multiplying both sides by $$8$$ to get $$8x=y^2$$. From this, we know that $$p=2$$ and the vertex is $$(0,0)$$. This means that the focus is $$(2,0)$$ and that the directrix is $$x=-2$$
